metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7582 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: The readBytes function in util/read.c in libming through 0.4.8 allows remote attackers to have unspecified impact via a crafted swf file that triggers a memory allocation failure.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
